aiNations.name: AI Nations
aiNations.description: Sets which nations will be AI-controlled. Type 'none' for no AI-controlled nation, or type a list, separating each nation with a comma (,). The format is the following: `'nation number' 'difficulty', 'nation number' 'difficulty', etc`. The difficulties available are `easy`, `normal`, `difficult`, `mighty`, `master`, and `impossible`. An example would be: `82 impossible, 50 master, 45 difficult`.`

artifactForging.name: Artifact Forging
artifactForging.description:
0 = players can only forge one artifact per turn
1 = players can forge more than one artifact per turn

ascensionPoints.name: Ascension Points
ascensionPoints.description: The total must be equal or lower than the sum of the throne points chosen, and above 0.

defaultAiLevel.name: Default AI Level
defaultAiLevel.description:
0 = no going AI
1 = easy
2 = normal
3 = difficult
4 = mighty
5 = master
6 = impossible

disciples.name: Disciples
disciples.description:
(You will have to set up the teams yourself on the pretender lobby) (**WARNING:** if you are using a map with pre-defined nation starts for a disciples game, select 1, as clustered will mess the special starts)

0 = off
1 = on
2 = on, with clustered starts

era.name: Era
era.description:
1 = Early Age
2 = Middle Age
3 = Late Age

level9Research.name: Level 9 Research
level9Research.description:
0 = level 9 spells need to be researched separately
1 = level 9 spells are researched normally

map.name: Mapfile
map.description: The filename of the map to use. You can type `/maps` to see what maps are available on the given server.

masterPassword.name: Master Password
masterPassword.description: Must not contain spaces or special characters other than underscores. Must be 3 to 20 characters long.

mods.name: Mods
mods.description: Type `none` for no mods, or copy and paste (letter-case counts) one or more mod filenames, separated by commas (,). You can type `/mods` to see what mods are available on the given server.

name.name: Game Name
name.description: Game name must be unique. No spaces or special characters other than underscores allowed. Must be 3 to 32 characters long.

researchSpeed.name: Research Speed
researchSpeed.description:
0 = very easy
1 = easy
2 = normal
3 = hard
4 = very hard

scoregraphs.name: Scoregraphs
scoregraphs.description:
0 = disabled (will remove any information on other nations, even through magic sites)
1 = off
2 = on.

startingResearch.name: Starting Research
startingResearch.description:
0 = random schools
1 = spread among all schools

storyEvents.name: Story Events
storyEvents.description:
0 = off
1 = minor events only
2 = full events

thrones.name: Thrones
thrones.description: Separated by commas, the number of level 1 thrones (inclusive from 0 to 20), the number of level 2 thrones (inclusive from 0 to 15), and the number of level 3 thrones (inclusive from 0 to 10). At least one must be above 0, and the total points must be equal or more than the ascension points required.

timer.name: Turn Timer
timer.description: Use the following format: `1d12h30m`, where `d` are the days, `h` the hours and `m` the minutes. If you type only an integer, like '32', it will be interpreted as hours
